segments.text: Hi , do you have any tickets for the show tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , it ’ s all sold out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , do you have any for tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have tickets for the matinee . It starts at 3p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where would you like to sit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have anything in the middle section ? I want a good view , but sitting too close hurts my eyes .
segments.speaker: S1
